description:
For off-track touring, these boots have a natural, medium flex for travel in uneven terrain and through heavier snow. Synthetic leather and Thinsulate insulation add warmth and protection from the elements.

  • Synthetic leather uppers
  • Thinsulate insulation adds deep-winter warmth
  • Hooks at the top of the laces keep them snug
  • Anatomic footbeds and medium flex ensure a natural stride when walking or skiing
  • Toe box protection and rubber rands
  • Soles are NNN BC compatible
name: Alpina Montana Backcountry Touring Boots - Unisex
